description.ruby-sapphire:
Powerful against paralyzed
foes, but also heals them.
description.emerald:
Powerful against paralyzed
foes, but also heals them.
description.firered-leafgreen:
Doubly effective on
a paralyzed foe,
but it also cures
the foe’s paralysis.
description.diamond-pearl:
This attack inflicts
double damage on a
paralyzed foe. It
also cures the foe’s
paralysis, however.

This attack inflicts
double damage on a
paralyzed foe. It
also cures the foe’s
paralysis, however.

This attack inflicts
double damage on a
paralyzed foe. It
also cures the foe’s

description.black-white:
This attack inflicts double damage on a
target with paralysis. It also cures the
target’s paralysis, however.

This attack inflicts double damage on a

description.sun-moon:
This attack’s power is doubled when used on a
target with paralysis. This also cures the target’s

description.sword-shield:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  If the target is paralyzed, this move has double power, and the target is cured of its paralysis.
effect.shortEffect: If the target is paralyzed, inflicts double damage and cures the paralysis.
